titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office located on Highway 90 in Bay Saint Louis, Mississippi, as the "John Longo, Jr., Post Office Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12031)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/20/1993--Introduced. Designates the United States Post Office Building located on Highway 90 in Bay Saint Louis, Mississippi, as the John Longo, Jr., Post Office Building.
